oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prayers to be recited during the ghaṭpāṭ ceremony; prayer includes recitation of the name of Ismāʻīlī Imāms as well as those of Pīrs.
Title page and publication data missing.
Pages stained, worm-eaten; text in black ink with red ink used for numbers, text borders as well as instructions concerning performance of prayers.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Arabic and Gujarati in Khojki script.
